Html:
Hi!

Is there a NuGet Package for GMap.NET?

Greetz, Manuel
nop, is it really worth to support it?

It's easy to accomplish, and if you use it once, you never want to miss it again :)

 

http://docs.nuget.org/docs/creating-packages/using-a-gui-to-build-packages << easy way to deploy only DLL's

http://docs.nuget.org/docs/creating-packages/creating-and-publishing-a-package << deploy more complex stuff

http://docs.nuget.org/docs/creating-packages/creating-and-publishing-a-symbol-package << deploy the pdbs

 

Also the updating to new versions of your component is easy for developers :)

Thanks radioman!
You are the best :)
